name: Last5shots
description:
Game made for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2. 

Theme: Rewind

Manage your 5 bullets by placing your shots wisely and rewinding them if you need to destroy enemy bullets or to save your shots. Survive as long as you can!

Disclaimer:

It might not seem like it, but this game was supposed to be a Story-teller :P 

Unfortunately I had only 3 days for developing it and only gameplay could be realized. Maybe I will continue on it in the future as it seemed a lot of fun.

Game entirely made by me.

Here's the repository if you want to learn how NOT to write good quality code (I warned you!): https://github.com/Manus9696/Last5shots
